    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of a disaccharide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung eines Disaccharids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'un disaccharide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de um disaccharide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di un disaccaride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός disaccharide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de un disacárido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how two monosaccharides are joined together through condensation to form a disaccharide held together by a glycosidic bond.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disaccharide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glycosidic bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydroxyl groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monosaccharide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie zwei Monosaccharide 
zusammen durch Kondensation verbunden werden, um ein Disaccharid zu 
bilden, das durch eine Glykosid- Bindung zusammengehalten wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment deux monosaccharides 
sont joints ensemble par la condensation pour former un disaccharide 
lié par une obligation glycosidique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como dois monosaccharides 
são juntados junto com a condensação para dar forma a um 
disaccharide prendido junto por uma ligação glycosidic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come due monosaccaridi si 
uniscono insieme con condensazione per formare un disaccaride tenuto 
insieme da un legame glicosidico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς δύο 
monosaccharides ενώνονται μαζί μέσω της συμπύκνωσης για να 
διαμορφώσουν disaccharide που διατηρείται τη συνοχή από έναν 
glycosidic δεσμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo dos monosacáridos se
ensamblan juntos con la condensación para formar un disacárido 
ligado por un enlace glucosídico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Disaccharid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glykosid- Bindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
